parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance for which the price is queried. This parameter is required if you upgrade an instance. You can specify this parameter to obtain the pre-upgrade configurations of the instance.

parameters.name: ModuleList
parameters.description: The information about the pricing module.

parameters.name: OrderType
parameters.description:
The type of the order. Valid values:

*   NewOrder: purchases an instance of an Alibaba Cloud service.
*   Renewal: renews an instance of an Alibaba Cloud service.
*   Upgrade: upgrades an instance of an Alibaba Cloud service.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The code of the service. For more information about the service code, see **Codes of Alibaba Cloud Services**.

parameters.name: ProductType
parameters.description: The type of the service. Specify the parameter based on the pricing document of the specific service.

parameters.name: Region
parameters.description: The ID of the region in which the instance resides.

parameters.name: ServicePeriodUnit
parameters.description:
The unit of the service duration. Valid values:

*   Year
*   Month

parameters.name: SubscriptionType
parameters.description: The billing method. Set the value to Subscription.
